summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4490 for the improvement of West Lynn Street from 29th Avenue West to 30th Avenue West; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52791, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
